node.excerpt: Many Rails devs I’ve spoken to quickly stop using the built-in generators - the common reason is that the generated files no longer suit the…

frontmatter.title: Don’t give up on your Rails Generators!
frontmatter.description: Most devs quickly stop using Rail's built-in generators. This is a pity, as generators can help improve team productivity - we just need to tweak them. In this post, we'll explore customising the rake task generator.
